name: Farlight Explorers
description: Extract and gather resources from different planets. Manage the supply of electricity, water, food and oxygen of your base in order to survive. Automate the creation of new products. Build a spaceship to transport your products to other places...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bits,8 64 bits,10 64 bits Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
